source.b2051f13:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def how_many_in_cat_plot(df, variable, color, a, i):
    ax = plt.subplot(3, 3, (i+1))
    ax.tick_params(labelrotation=15)
    #df[variable].hist(ax = ax)
    plt.hist(df[variable], facecolor = color, alpha=a)
    plt.title(variable)

source.fe0e77bd:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def df_hist_plot(df, variable, nbins, color, a,i):
    ax = plt.subplot(3, 3, (i+1))
    #ax.tick_params(labelrotation=15)    
    df[variable].hist(bins=nbins, color=color, alpha=a)
    plt.title(variable)
source.acef2c75:
colors = ['red', 'blue', 'orange', 'green', 'magenta', 'pink', 'black', 'grey']
col_list = ['Unit price', 'Tax 5%', 'Total', 'cogs', 'gross income', 'Rating']
fig = plt.figure(figsize = (30,20))
for i, feature in enumerate(col_list[:-1]):
    df_hist_plot(df, feature, 25, colors[i%len(colors)],0.5, i)
    
df_hist_plot(df, col_list[i+1], 7, colors[(i+1)%len(colors)],0.5, i+1)
